name: Venedon
relicBonuses: At the start of battle, this relic gives the bearer {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE}.
After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or {ACTION_casts} a single-target spell on an enemy, this relic {ACTION_attacks} the enemy.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks}, the bearer has a 50% chance to gain {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE}.
After the bearer gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE}, it gains 25% {STAT_intelligence}.
After the bearer manually {ACTION_casts} a spell, it has a 50% chance to gain {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE}.
After the bearer is damaged by an attack or spell, it has a 50% chance to gain {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE}.
The damage of the bearer's attacks is based on its {STAT_intelligence}.
This relic has additional {STAT_attack} equal to its bearer's {STAT_intelligence}.
When the bearer takes damage, 50% of its {STAT_intelligence} is added to its {STAT_defense} to determine the amount of damage it receives.
At the end of the bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1980]Black Ice.
title: God of Discord
